snippet.title: Banned Memories - Dev Trailer
snippet.description:
Banned Memories: Yamanashi returns with a new trailer showcasing what the game looks like right now. 

The entire trailer was built in Game Maker: Studio, which is (for now) the engine the entire game will be built in. This short trailer shows protagonist Hideo sitting in the southern courtyard, waiting for the bells to ring again and do everything he did all over again.

Thanks all for the support! I really appreciate it! Currently trying to get my hands on a Net Yaroze to develop this game for a real PS1!

Please tell me what you think!

- Noah
